name: The Reaper Watches Me
description:
You were sent a protector to guide you through the foretold disaster when you were young. Now, as an adult, you've been found by a ragtag group of Onlookers, who were able to see your protector as you were. They believe you're meant to be sacrificed to save the world from the disaster yet to come. But what if you were meant to save it in another way? With the help of your protector...

The Grim Reaper.

Customize your character: choose your gender, pronouns, and appearance (hair color, hair length, hair texture, eye color, skin color, and height).

Will you be able to save the world with your powers or sacrifice yourself to save it?

Five romance-able characters that will help you or be your downfall. (There are two gender-selectable characters).

If you experience any bugs, or grammar errors, or just want to simply comment, fill out this form. Thank you!
